data.comment: The match has started at Volkswagen Arena.
Important block from the Stuttgart defence as Renato Steffen fires in a strike for Wolfsburg.
In the minute 1, Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg's Maxence Lacroix attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolfsburg.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
Throw-in Wolfsburg.
In Wolfsburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 7, Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Florian Badstubner signals a Stuttgart throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Stuttgart goal kick.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Stuttgart close to the penalty box.
Stuttgart have a dangerous throw-in.
Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 12, Wolfsburg's Yannick Gerhardt is on target but unsuccessful.
Wolfsburg are pushing forward but Yannick Gerhardt's finish is wide of the goal.
Stuttgart have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in Stuttgart territory.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
In Wolfsburg Wolfsburg drive forward through Josip Brekalo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 14, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Florian Badstubner awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 18, Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Stuttgart's half?
Ball safe as Stuttgart is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Wolfsburg.
In the minute 20, Nicolas Gonzalez for Stuttgart has been booked by Florian Badstubner and receives a first yellow card.
Florian Badstubner signals a throw-in for Stuttgart, close to Wolfsburg's area.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Stuttgart.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Stuttgart is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Florian Badstubner awards Stuttgart a goal kick.
Silas Wamangituka of Stuttgart gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
Orel Mangala (Stuttgart) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 27, Stuttgart have been awarded a corner by Florian Badstubner.
Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Stuttgart.
In the minute 30, Stuttgart's Borna Sosa gets in a shot on goal at Volkswagen Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Wout Weghorst for Wolfsburg drives towards goal at Volkswagen Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Stuttgart awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Florian Badstubner awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Stuttgart.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in the half of Stuttgart.
In the minute 35, Florian Badstubner awards Stuttgart a goal kick.
Throw-in for Stuttgart at Volkswagen Arena.
Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Stuttgart.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
Free kick for Stuttgart in their own half.
Stuttgart advance rapidly upfield but Florian Badstubner blows for offside.
In the minute 42, Florian Badstubner signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in Stuttgart's half.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Florian Badstubner.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolfsburg.
In the minute 44, Silas Wamangituka for the away team is judged to be offside.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
At Volkswagen Arena the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Wolfsburg in the half of Stuttgart.
The first-half is over at Volkswagen Arena.
The second-half is underway at Volkswagen Arena.
In the minute 46, Stuttgart have been awarded a corner by Florian Badstubner.
Marc Kempf (Stuttgart) gets in a header but the ball hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Goal kick for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
In the minute 47, Can Stuttgart get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Wolfsburg just outside Stuttgart's area.
Waldemar Anton (Stuttgart) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 50, Goal! Wolfsburg have got their heads in front thanks to a Josip Brekalo strike.
Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Stuttgart.
In the minute 54, Stuttgart needs to be cautious. Wolfsburg have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Stuttgart in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Orel Mangala for Stuttgart who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Josip Brekalo.
In the minute 58, Free kick Stuttgart.
Josip Brekalo for Wolfsburg is back on the field again.
Orel Mangala has recovered and rejoins the match in Wolfsburg.
In the minute 59, Wolfsburg have a goal kick.
Stuttgart to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
Kevin Mbabu is replacing Josip Brekalo for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 61, The away team replace Silas Wamangituka with Roberto Massimo.
Pellegrino Matarazzo is making the team's second substitution at Volkswagen Arena with Mateo Klimowicz replacing Tanguy Coulibaly.
In the minute 62, Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in Stuttgart territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
Roberto Massimo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Stuttgart.
In the minute 66, Florian Badstubner signals a Stuttgart throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
In Wolfsburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Stuttgart capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Wolfsburg's half?
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
Bartosz Bialek's header is off-target for Wolfsburg.
Stuttgart have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, In Wolfsburg, Nicolas Gonzalez of Stuttgart is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In Wolfsburg Stuttgart drive forward through Mateo Klimowicz. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Wolfsburg make their second substitution with Daniel Ginczek replacing Bartosz Bialek.
In the minute 73, Oliver Glasner (Wolfsburg) is making a third substitution, with John Brooks replacing Marin Pongracic.
Sasa Kalajdzic is replacing Pascal Stenzel for the away team.
Wout Weghorst for Wolfsburg drives towards goal at Volkswagen Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolfsburg.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Stuttgart.
Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Stuttgart's half?
In the minute 76, Stuttgart awarded a free kick in their own half.
Renato Steffen is booked for the home team.
Can Stuttgart get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
In the minute 77, Florian Badstubner signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in Stuttgart's half.
Wolfsburg push forward at Volkswagen Arena and Ridle Baku gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Stuttgart defence.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
In the minute 79, Throw-in high up the field for Stuttgart in Wolfsburg.
Stuttgart have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Stuttgart in the half of Wolfsburg.
In the minute 81, The away team have replaced Daniel Didavi with Philipp Klement. This is the fourth substitution made today by Pellegrino Matarazzo.
Stuttgart have been awarded a corner by Florian Badstubner.
In the minute 82, Wolfsburg's Josuha Guilavogui breaks free at Volkswagen Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Stuttgart goal kick.
The away team have replaced Borna Sosa with Gonzalo Castro. This is the fifth substitution made today by Pellegrino Matarazzo.
Gonzalo Castro (Stuttgart) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 85, Stuttgart to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
Stuttgart have been awarded a corner by Florian Badstubner.
In the minute 86, Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Wolfsburg.
Orel Mangala (Stuttgart) has received a first yellow card.
Joao Victor is on a sub for Ridle Baku for Wolfsburg.
Corner awarded to Stuttgart.
In the minute 89, Florian Badstubner awards Wolfsburg a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Stuttgart at Volkswagen Arena.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Wolfsburg.
Free kick for Stuttgart in their own half.
Florian Badstubner signals a free kick to Stuttgart in their own half.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Yannick Gerhardt (Wolfsburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
